rules.name: Code Chivalric
rules.lore: Imperial Knights fight by a stringent set of codes to ensure that in addition to defeating the enemy, honor is always upheld.
rules.text:
At the start of the battle, select one of the Chivalric Oaths below. Your army gains the stated Oath Ability. If, at the start of a Battle Round, the corresponding Deed is completed, your army becomes "Honored" and you gain +3 Command Points (limit once per battle).

### Lay Low the Tyrant

* **Oath Ability:** Each Activation, this model may re-roll one Hit roll and one Wound roll.
* **Deed:** Destroy the enemy +Warlord+.

### Reclaim the Realm

* **Oath Ability:** Add 1" to this model's Movement trait and add 1 to this model's Advance and Charge rolls.
* **Deed:** Control one or more objective markers in your opponent's deployment zone.

rules.name: Bondsman
rules.text: Some +Imperial Knights+ have a "Bondsman" ability. When such a unit is Activated, select a friendly +Armiger+ unit within 12" of the Activated unit. The Bondsman ability is applied to that unit. Units may not be affected by more than one Bondsman ability at a time.

rules.name: Super-Heavy Walker
rules.text: When a model with this ability makes a Normal, Advance, or Fall Back movement, it may move through other models (excluding +Titanic+ models) and terrain features. If it moves through a terrain feature 5" tall or higher, it must take a Battle-Shock test after moving.

strategems.name: Armor of Contempt
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit has declared a Ranged or Melee attack
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit has +1 to its Saving Rolls.
